com.isti.traceview.gui
Class ScaleModeCom

java.lang.Object
  com.isti.traceview.gui.ScaleModeAbstract
      com.isti.traceview.gui.ScaleModeCom
All Implemented Interfaces:
IScaleModeState
public class ScaleModeCom
extends ScaleModeAbstract
implements IScaleModeState

State pattern realization for scale mode, COM scaling. It means that value axis in all channel views scales to the same maximum and minimum values. Maximum and minimum searches among all loaded in graph panel traces (in all channel views) in visible time range.

Author:
Max Kokoulin
